column4: I just setup a 9.10 server.  Font encoding is utf-8. How do I change the encoding so colon will show as a colon and not a small diamond?
I just setup a 9.10 server.  Font encoding is utf-8. How do I change the encoding so colon will show as a colon and not a small diamond?
where does it appear like that? a local console, or remote?
